Class ProxyUtil

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for create client proxies.

      • createClientProxy

        public static <T> T createClientProxy(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                      java.lang.Class<T> proxyInterface,
                                      JsonRpcClient client,
                                      java.net.Socket socket)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a Proxy of the given proxyInterface that uses the given JsonRpcClient.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the proxy type
        Parameters:
        classLoader - the ClassLoader
        proxyInterface - the interface to proxy
        client - the JsonRpcClient
        socket - the Socket
        Returns:
        the proxied interface
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when creating the input stream, the output stream, the socket is closed, the socket is not connected, or the socket input has been shutdown using shutdownInput()
